import { Fragment, useState } from "react" import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react" import { ExclamationTriangleIcon, XMarkIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline" const Modal = ({ open, setOpen, titleText, bodyText, cancelButtonText, confirmButtonText, cancelButtonAction, confirmButtonAction, }) => { return (
{titleText}

{bodyText}
) } export default Modal
